title: I know Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of Zouk’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cracks: The appearance of cracks in a dream is one of the things that disgusts and angers people, with the different situations that appear in the dream, whether it is in the toilet, on the floor, or in other situations. Stool is abundant and indicates many and varied things in a person’s life. Sometimes it warns him of some people, while some slug dreams may indicate food and commercial profits, and in our topic we explain the most important interpretations of this dream. Follow usInterpretation of a dream about zigzag The interpretation of plaster in a dream confirms some material conditions that improve for the dreamer when he feels comfortable after relieving himself or with the appearance of feces in the dirt, that is, the person hides it. There are some cases that warn a person of bad deeds due to his insistence on doing them, and the things that he does in reality are false. And sins, including walking with feces in a dream, which is a bad sign and a warning sign for the sleeper. You get it because of your generosity to people and not harming them. Interpretation of the dream of the alley by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin confirms in his interpretation of the dream of the alley that it is a good sign for someone who is interested in studying and is trying hard to occupy a high position in it. Among Ibn Sirin’s bad meanings is that the sleeper defecates in front of others and finds a group of people around him while he He comforts himself and exposes himself to a great scandal that is seen by those around him with this dream, God forbid. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds on the secret dream interpretation site from Google. Interpretation of the dream of Zouk by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s opinions come in the interpretation of the dream of excrement, and he believes that defecation may indicate spending a lot of money. Money. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream for a girl is one of the things that confirms that she will meet her life partner and become in a good relationship with him, which means that the bad feelings that surrounded her heart will go away and she will feel reassured nonetheless. A short connection with a good person, and this is if she finds herself defecating in the toilet, which means that it is necessary to be out of the sight of others in her dream, but defecating in front of people is not considered good at all, because it indicates divulging secrets and scandals. It is good that the girl does not suffer from pain Severe or difficult defecation, this indicates the many difficulties of life that she is controlling, which may enter the days that she lives and is likely to delay her marriage age with this dream. There are many messages that may reach an unmarried woman with this dream, especially if she defecates in her clothes, as it indicates that she is deceiving people and lying to them to achieve her own interests, and she must stay away from this evil act. One who does not please God. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman: A dream of excrement for a married woman confirms good meanings, if she resorts to a place far from people to defecate, such as the toilet, as it shows the intense bliss in which she lives with her children and husband, in addition to her constant desire to do good deeds and not anger her Lord. And this is with full commitment to worship and not violating the commands of God Almighty. One of the things that the dream of an alley indicates to a married woman is that she will live beautiful and calm days, especially if she does not face any difficulty in defecation, while severe pain

title: Interpretation of selfie in a dream and taking a selfie in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a selfie indicates that I am in trouble and indicates travel and other interpretations. We will interpret it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a divorced man, such as taking a picture with the man. The front camera of the mobile phone, or taking a selfie with the lover or with the husband, or taking pictures with a famous person, or with the president, or with someone from Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and more in the topic: Interpretation of a selfie in a dream The meaning of a selfie in a dream It indicates that you may have A project or event in your mind that you think is true, but in reality it is the opposite. A vision taken from the front camera in a dream, or the so-called selfie, that is, whoever sees in his dream that he is taking a selfie or taking pictures, his vision indicates the illusions that the person with the vision experiences in real life. And she suffers from a lot of psychological problems, as the dreamer tries to tell himself some false things to convince her and get rid of what is weakness, confusion, and weakness. Taking a picture in a dream indicates a repetition of events, which means that the dreamer will experience the event twice, and if the capture is beautiful, then the dreamer will experience a beautiful event. And happy, and for this reason the dreamer will see him feeling great joy, and at the same time he will live beautiful days and feel very excited. However, if the image is not colorful and unclear, he will go through an event that was a nightmare for him, and he will return to the past, and he will suffer again, and he will experience a period of depression. Seeing taking a picture in a dream shows goodness and happiness for the dreamer and that the dreamer will take happy pictures of himself throughout his life. Seeing someone taking pictures of you in a dream does not bode well for this vision, as it either indicates the coming disaster for the dreamer and its appearance in the near future, or it indicates the dreamer’s wound. With sadness and fear. Seeing a camera in a dream means that you are going through sad events. The camera in a dream will cause a deep wound because of one of the people he trusted, and because of this the dreamer will understand who is a friend and who is an enemy and will work to get rid of useless people. Seeing taking a family photo in a dream indicates To the presence of something that goes back to the past, as the dreamer will experience happy and painful events at the same time, because it symbolizes things in the past. By taking pictures in a dream, this vision shows the happiness that the dreamer will experience throughout his life, and indicates the presence of major and important developments in his life. And if he sees If a person takes a picture in a dream himself, this is an indication that he will achieve a large profit on his own without receiving support from anyone. But if we talk about the religious aspect, this indicates that the family is doing charitable work and this work brings financial benefit and the person with insight will receive a large reward. As for If the photo is taken with many people, it is an indication of the visionary’s trip abroad for a vacation. It also indicates that the name of the visionary will be popular in future generations because of the works he presents, and his fame and success will reach foreign lands, and he will hear praise from everyone and be proud of his works throughout his life. .Roa indicates

title: What is the interpretation of seeing white cats in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s good and evil?

preview.html: Many seek Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing white cats in a dream. There are many who love cats in reality and prefer to own them because of their nature and ease of dealing with them, while there are those who hate cats and hate dealing with them. With them and are afraid to see them, so seeing a cat in a dream is a vision that causes anxiety and confusion, and its owner wants to know its correct interpretation. The interpretation of a dream about a white cat is different from a black or gray cat. Dream interpretation scholars, the most famous of whom is Ibn Sirin, interpreted the dream of white cats for single men, married women, and pregnant women, and here More details for the encyclopedia. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. The dream interpretation scholar, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, says that when the dreamer sees cats in a dream, this may mean that he will meet a hypocritical person and try to get close to him. This vision may indicate that the dreamer will assume an important position during the period The next, if he is qualified for it. Whoever sees a large cat in his dream, his vision indicates that he wants to take his life and change it for the better. A dream about a cat attack indicates that the dreamer will face difficulties, whether in his studies or at work. In the event that the dreamer is able to get rid of From this attack and overcoming the cat, this vision is good news for him to overcome these difficulties and achieve victory over his enemies. Among the ominous visions is the dream of a cat for the fortuneteller, as it indicates that someone close to the fortuneteller will betray him, or that he will be disappointed because he did not live up to it, or that he He will face a health problem that prevents him from achieving his goals. As for the cat that scratches the dreamer in a dream, this indicates the presence of someone who wants to impose his control over the dreamer. The interpretation of cats in a dream also varies according to their ferocity. A dream about a meek cat promises its owner to hear news that will make him happy and give him comfort and peace. In his life. But if the cat is wild; The dream indicates that the dreamer will face crises and difficulties in his life. If one sees a cat in his dream, and it looks ugly, then his vision indicates that he will live a year full of worries. When one dreams that he is afraid of cats, this means that he is very careful in his life and can judge the path Things are going right. This vision may indicate that the dreamer is afraid to conduct experiments whose results are unclear or make certain decisions. Seeing a cat without a tail indicates the dreamer’s inability to obtain his freedom. Seeing white cats in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen the dreamer sees cats in a dream And they have white skin, so this may mean that it will bring him goodness in his life and bring him safety and security. Ibn Sirin interpreted the white cat in a dream as an indication of the presence of an evil woman seeking to get close to the fortuneteller. If the white cat in the dream has a beautiful appearance and its whiteness Pure, it means that the dreamer has strong confidence in himself and his superiority over others. The color of a white cat in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s enemies among his relatives and those who are not strangers to him. If one sees in his dream that a white cat is growing, then his vision indicates that there are many people near From him they hate him and

title: Interpretation of seeing the first reading of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. The meaning of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream

preview.html: In detail, learn about the interpretation of the vision of reading the first Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, and the meaning of “reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream,” as dream interpretation scholars have interpreted the visions of reading all the surahs of the Qur’an. . Interpretation scholars have attributed the vision of the dreamer reciting a surah from the Qur’an to the attainment of goodness and justice in that person’s religion. Many people search for an interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, as the symbol of the Qur’an is one of the common symbols in the world of dreams that promises good dreamers, because the Qur’an in Reality symbolizes faith. Calmness, tranquility and tranquility. She said to her generosity: Everything has a hump, and the hump of the Qur’an is Surah Al-Baqarah. Whoever reads it in his house at night, Satan will not enter it for three nights.”Well, reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream suggests that goodness comes to the one who dreams of it, but what did the dream interpreters say about the meanings of this dream, whether for a man or a woman? You can see this in the encyclopedia in the following lines. Interpretation of seeing the first reading of Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream. As for seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream, it indicates the appearance of an almost comfort for the dreamer after extreme fatigue and suffering in his life as a result of previous crises. And when the dreamer sees that he is reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream This indicates the attainment of goodness and a good life and shows the demons that were in that person’s life. Ibn Shirin interpreted seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream as an indication that he will live a long life. This dream of reciting Surat Al-Baqarah may indicate that this person will improve his life in this world and improve His religious affairs, and the more time and number of surahs that the dreamer reads in the dream, the more this indicates an increase in achieving goodness for that person. As for seeing the judge in a dream reading Surat Al-Baqarah, this is evidence that that judge is approaching death. And when one sees that he is reading Surah Al-Baqarah The cow, this is evidence of an inheritance crisis and that this crisis was between some brothers and cousins, and that this problem will be solved. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dreamDream interpreters have reported that reciting Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s piety, guidance, and enjoyment of good morals. If the dreamer sees that he is reciting the beginning of Surat Al-Baqarah, then this is good news that his situation will change for the better, in addition to this vision symbolizing his long life. If the dreamer sees himself reciting Surat Al-Baqarah to a person in a dream, then this is one of the promising dreams for that person to get rid of his worries and remove His sadness, with his benevolence and giving him a lot. When the dreamer dreams that he is reciting Surah Al-Baqarah to his brothers, this indicates the work that the dreamer is doing to divide and distribute the money among them, which is inheritance money in reality. When the dreamer sees himself reciting Surah Al-Baqarah to a student in the dream, this is good news. He can excel in his studies and obtain the highest grades. Interpretation of reading Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpreter quoted Ibn Sirin in interpreting this vision as evidence of protection from the evil of Satan. This vision for the sick dreamer symbolizes the improvement of his health condition and his recovery. This vision is one of the promising visions. That

title: Interpretation of a dream about a palm tree

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a palm tree in a dream: We may find that some people are looking for an interpretation of a dream about a palm tree in a dream, and there are a large number of connotations and interpretations of dreams, and we find that in general, scholars and diligent people are looking for interpretations, and site managers do not interfere in interpretations, rather they Sent for the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a palm tree in a dream: Anyone who dreams of dry palm trees can indicate that he is a hypocrite and needs to repent to God. Dreaming of dry palm trees in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. This may indicate that any person Dreaming of palm leaves in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need to supplicate to the Blessed and Most High God, and beg Him to change his affairs and affairs for the better. Seeing palm trees in a dream may indicate changes in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds and dust in a dream: Seeing palm leaves in a dream may indicate changes in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds and dust in a dream: Seeing palm leaves in a dream may indicate changes in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about strong winds and dust in a dream Strong winds with dust in a dream indicate some problems and crises that the dreamer is facing in his life at that time. Anyone who dreams of strong winds and dust may indicate unhappy events that the dreamer may face during those days. A dream about dust and heavy air may indicate fears that the dreamer faces in His life and he needs to ask God for help. Whoever sees in his dream a lot of wind and dust, it may indicate a psychological crisis that the dreamer is suffering from, and he must repent and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about dogs chasing the dead in a dream: Seeing dogs chasing a dead person in a dream may indicate The deceased’s need for friendship and supplication. Whoever dreams of dogs chasing a dead person may indicate his bad deeds, and God knows best. If you see dogs chasing the dreamer in a dream and barking at him, this may indicate that he did some bad things in life at that time and should ask for forgiveness. Interpretation of a dream Buying new phones in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he has bought a new phone may indicate the blessings that the dreamer enjoyed in his life during those days. A person who sees himself buying new shoes may indicate joys coming to the dreamer in his life during this time. In case he sees If someone has bought a new phone, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during those days, thanks to God. Seeing the purchase of a new phone in a dream may indicate the livelihood and lightning that the dreamer gains in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a quarrel with A dead father in a dream: A quarrel with a dead father in a dream may indicate the strength of the dreamer’s longing for his father in those days. In the case where a person saw that he was quarreling with his deceased father, this may indicate the visionary’s great need for his father at that time. Seeing a quarrel with a father A dead person in a dream may indicate the nostalgia and longing that the dreamer feels in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating a type of fruit in a dream. If one sees that he is eating fruit, this may indicate wealth and huge money that the dreamer acquires with the grace of God. title: Interpretation of a dream about a colored abaya

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a colored abaya in a dream for a single girl: The colored abaya changes the situation for the single girl. If her situation is bad, it will change for the better. The unmarried woman who buys the colored abaya declares that she feels very happy in the coming period. If she looks at the colored abaya, this indicates her dream. With the goal and wants to reach it soon. Seeing the colored abaya shows the abundant goodness that this single woman will enjoy in her life. The colored abaya being torn in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that something in her life will not be completed, and God knows best. The colored abaya in the dream indicates a relationship The new love of an unmarried girl, God willing. And if he buys a colorful abaya in a dream, this means that he will soon have a new life. A tight, colorful abaya indicates that you have something that you love, but you will face problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a woman wearing an abaya. Interpretation of seeing a colorful abaya In a dream for a married woman: Seeing a colored abaya for a married woman means that she will get rid of the sad situation she is living in. If she buys a wide colored abaya, this indicates a new life full of happiness and nourishment for her. Seeing a torn colored abaya in a dream means that she will be sad about an important matter in her life. Abaya A colorful abaya for a married woman indicates happiness and good luck for the married woman, God willing. If a married woman looks at a colorful abaya in a dream, this is a sign that she will overcome problems. Seeing a wide and beautiful colored abaya indicates her livelihood and a happy life, God willing. If a stranger gives her a colorful abaya in a dream This means that she is preparing for the upcoming marriage. A married woman who sees a colored abaya indicates abundance of sustenance and goodness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a colored abaya in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman buying a colored abaya in a dream indicates her closeness to marriage. If she takes the colored abaya from a close person, this means that she is preparing for the upcoming marriage. It indicates her closeness to that person. The colored abaya of a divorced woman indicates good luck and the abundance of goodness in her life, God willing. If a divorced woman wants to buy a colored abaya, this is a sign of happiness near her. And seeing her taking off the colored abaya indicates that she has committed sins and immorality in her life, by God. I know. A divorced woman who buys a tight-fitting colored abaya is a sign that she is doing bad things in her life. If a divorced woman gives the colored abaya to another woman, this indicates that she is doing good in her life. If the abaya is of light colors, this indicates good things for her and her family. Interpretation Seeing a colored abaya in a dream for a man and its meaning: Seeing a man giving his wife a colored abaya is a sign of his close marriage with her, God willing. Seeing a man wearing a colorful abaya indicates the profit of his business and money, God willing. As for the dreamer who sees the colorful abaya in a dream, it is an indication that he will see Happiness and a peaceful life. If the colored abaya is torn, this indicates his loss for a very important reason

title: Interpretation of a dream about a lot of money by Ibn Sirin and major scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lot of money can be evidence of many meanings related to the dreamer’s life, depending on the details of the vision. There are those who see a lot of coins, and there are those who dream of a lot of paper money, and one can see that the dead person is the one giving him money, or that he finds it on the ground or inside. Envelope.Interpretation of a dream of a lot of money. A dream of a lot of money may be evidence that the dreamer has many friends who must know their value and preserve it, or the dream may indicate the imminent arrival of some happy news to the dreamer. A dream of a lot of money can indicate blessing and goodness. In life, this is a great blessing for the dreamer to know its value and thank God Almighty for it. With regard to the dream of a lot of red money, it can remind the dreamer of the necessity of engaging in various acts of obedience and the will to get closer to God and abandon forbidden things and sins, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a lot of money By Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that a lot of money in a dream can be good news for the dreamer to obtain an extensive diet in the near future, provided that he works hard and does not hesitate to pray to God Almighty for goodness and blessings, or the dream. Abundant money may be a sign of good health and this is a great blessing for a person to appreciate its value, and God Almighty is thankful for it. To dream of a bunch of banknotes can symbolize failure in the religious aspect and that the dreamer must repent to God Almighty and ask Him for forgiveness and forgiveness for this shortcoming, as well as He should be concerned with different actions. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a lot of money for single people: A dream about a lot of money for an unmarried girl can indicate the ambition and determination that the dreamer has and that he should not abandon these good qualities, perseverance, and seeking the help of God Almighty until he achieves what he wants. Life, and dreaming of a lot of money could be evidence that the dreamer has fallen into confusion as a result of some things, life, and here she advises the dreamer to arrange things and set priorities until her mind is stable. To dream of obtaining a lot of coins can portend problems and disagreements with friends or family, and here The dreamer must be more careful in dealing with those around him and pray to God a lot for the continuity of love. As for dreaming of paper money, it may predict that the dreamer may be in possession of some valuable things in the near future, or the dream may symbolize marriage in the near future and that... The dreamer has to ask God for help. This matter works well for her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a lot of money for a married woman: Interpretation of a dream of a lot of money for a married woman may simply be a reflection of her inner desire to obtain more money, and therefore she should ask God Almighty to grant her His grace, and for the sake of a dream she found money. in it. My way, it can symbolize the dreamer's girlfriend and that he is loyal to her and loves her deeply and so he must protect her

title: Interpretation of a dream about washing feet from mud in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about washing one’s feet from mud in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing one’s feet from mud in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing one’s feet from mud in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself washing his feet from mud in a dream, this may be a sign of good news. And God knows best. It could also be a sign of salvation from illness, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself washing his feet of mud, this may lead to money, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing the genitals of a deceased person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing the nakedness of a dead person in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this except Seeing the nakedness of a dead person in a dream could be a sign of revealing secrets, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the nakedness of the dead person when covering him, this may lead to anxiety, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his organs during washing, this may indicate sin, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Likewise, if he sees The dreamer is naked or dead, then this may be a sign of an oath that must be prevented, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about washing dirt in a dream Interpretation of a dream about washing dirt in a dream could be a sign of freedom from anxiety, and God knows best When you see a married man, washing away impurity can lead to Freedom from sadness, and God knows the unseen. Washing can also be a sign of justice and good treatment, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing a child’s hair in a dream. Interpretation of dreaming of washing carpets with water and soap in a dream is evidence of praiseworthy things, God willing. If the dreamer dreams of washing carpets with water and soap, this may lead to a high status, and God knows the unseen. It can also express the attainment of a high status, and God is higher. And I know that if an unmarried girl is seen washing carpets with water, then perhaps it is food, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen washing the child from her waste, she will recover, and God knows the unseen. When you see a child washing the feces in a dream, this may indicate the release of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream can be evidence. On purity, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl washing dishes in a dream, this could be evidence of cleanliness and purity, and God is Most High.

title: What do you know about the interpretation of Zamzam water in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the great translators?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about Zamzam water in a dream: Zamzam water is found only in Mecca, and God Almighty blew it under the feet of our master Ismail when he was a child, and until now and on the Day of Resurrection the water continues to flow. Zamzam water brings goodness and blessings to whoever drinks it, so what if he sees it in a dream? This is what we will learn in today’s topic. Interpretation of a dream about Zamzam water in a dream. The interpreters said that seeing Zamzam water in a dream is evidence of the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will receive in his life, and if he has children, God will make them good children for themselves and their society. Drinking Zamzam water in a dream is evidence of achieving all What the dreamer wants. But if a person sees water in a dream and does not drink it, then he suffers from some sins from which he has not yet been freed, and he must repent to God, give alms, and perform good deeds until He accepts him and forgives him. For his past sins and bless him for everything that will come. Drinking this pure, pure water in a dream indicates the dreamer’s superiority and success in his life, whether emotional, family, or practical. Interpretation of dreams of Ibn Sirin’s Zamzam water Ibn Sirin said: Zamzam water is a sign of getting rid of worries and sorrows The person concerned, and evidence of getting rid of the disease and improving the patient’s health, and seeing it is good. If a girl sees in her dream that water is running in front of her and she wants to drink from it, then she has ambition and a goal that she seeks to achieve, and she may want to complete her studies and obtain a high university degree. Which increases her position and standing in society. In all cases, seeing her is evidence of the satisfaction of her desires. As for the water flowing from the Zamzam well in a dream, it indicates the abundance of goodness that descends upon the dreamer. Whoever sees that he cannot extend his hand to the Zamzam water while it is in front of him and is unable to He drinks from it, as he is disobedient and has committed many sins, and he must get rid of these sins first in order to be blessed with sustenance. And in life as well. Interpretation of seeing Zamzam water in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about Zamzam water for an unmarried woman shows that she has a lot of goodness and evidence of piety, purity, and the most beautiful qualities that make people love her and wish her good luck and success in her life. As for seeing her drinking from it until she is full, this is a sign However, the date of her marriage is to a young man with good morals and a good reputation, and above all to a rich man, with whom she will live a happy life full of friendship and companionship. Love that has good children approaches him. If a girl bathes in this pure water in her dream and she is going through a certain crisis in her life, she will overcome her crises very soon and live in peace and tranquility in the coming period. If a girl sees the well of Zamzam and its water runs out in a dream, she will suffer If an unmarried woman drinks Zamzam water and feels sad, she will quickly come out of her sadness, and if this sadness is Because of her emotional failure or cancellation of her engagement, she will not continue her grief for long, but will overcome it. She will be dealing with more important matters in her life, for example

As for the water flowing from the Zamzam well in a dream, it indicates the abundance of goodness that descends upon the dreamer. Whoever sees that he cannot extend his hand to the Zamzam water while it is in front of him and is unable to He drinks from it, as he is disobedient and has committed many sins, and he must get rid of these sins first in order to be blessed with sustenance. And in life as well. Interpretation of seeing Zamzam water in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about Zamzam water for an unmarried woman shows that she has a lot of goodness and evidence of piety, purity, and the most beautiful qualities that make people love her and wish her good luck and success in her life. As for seeing her drinking from it until she is full, this is a sign However, the date of her marriage is to a young man with good morals and a good reputation, and above all to a rich man, with whom she will live a happy life full of friendship and companionship. Love that has good children approaches him. If a girl bathes in this pure water in her dream and she is going through a certain crisis in her life, she will overcome her crises very soon and live in peace and tranquility in the coming period. If a girl sees the well of Zamzam and its water runs out in a dream, she will suffer If an unmarried woman drinks Zamzam water and feels sad, she will quickly come out of her sadness, and if this sadness is Because of her emotional failure or cancellation of her engagement, she will not continue her grief for long, but will overcome it.
